question: does watching tv break ur wudu? if a piece of skin peels off ur body does this break ur wudu as well?
answer:
QUESTION
does watching tv break ur wudu? if a piece of skin peels off ur body does this break ur wudu as well?
ANSWER


Share:
1. It is not permissible to watch TV, however, that does not invalidate the Wudhu. It is Mustahabb to re-perform Wudhu after committing a sin.

2. No, skin peeling off does not break your Wudhu so long as no blood, etc. flows out. (Bahishti Zewar vol.1)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
